topic.title: Cover of Vaccination Evaluated Rapidly (COVER) Data Set
topic.shortdesc: IntroductionThe Cover of Vaccination Evaluated Rapidly (COVER) Data Set is used to evaluate the routine childhood Immunisation Programme in England for children up to 5 years of age.
